name: Give Up the Ghost: a puzzle checklist
name_original: Give Up the Ghost: a puzzle checklist
description:
Give Up the Ghost: a puzzle checklist

This game will autosave your progress locally.

Controls

Click game to give it focus if it is not responding to input.

Game arrow keys (or WASD)
moveZ
undoRrestart level
Xshow floor (hide objects)
Mopen menu
Menu arrow keys (or WASD)
move cursor
Z or X
confirm
Credits

Code | Art | Music | SFX | Puzzle Design
John M. Williams @GateEightyEight

Opening Poem
Anonymous Japanese Folk Song
Translated by Kenneth Rexroth

TIC-80 Fantasy Console
Vadim Grigoruk @nesboxcom
